text: uṅkaḷ peṇkaḷil evaḷēṉum māṉakkēṭāṉa ceyal ceytuviṭ(ṭatākak kuṟṟam cumattappaṭ)ṭāl, atai nirūpikka uṅkaḷiliruntu nāṉku pērkaḷai aḻaiyuṅkaḷ;. Avarkaḷ atai (meyppaṭutti) cāṭci kūṟiviṭṭāl, (appeṇkaḷai) maraṇam kaippaṟṟum varaiyil allatu avarkaḷukku allāh oru vaḻiyai uṇṭākkum varaiyil avarkaḷai vīṭukaḷil taṭuttu vaiyuṅkaḷ
